I cannot describe into words how i feel; but wow what a night. Taylor is amazing! I am
currently suffering from post eras tour depression because i cant believe its over. The night was truly sparkling and i will always remember it all too well.

The show was full of energy, ambience, and love. It is so well done and heartwarming to sing your TS favs at the top of your lungs either your favorite people. My 19 year old daughter and I will forever cherish the memories we made that night! Can’t wait for the next tour, Taylor! ♥️

The show was full of energy, ambience, and love. It is so well done and heartwarming to sing your TS favs at the top of your lungs either your favorite people. My 19 year old daughter and I will forever cherish the memories we made that night! Can’t wait for the next tour, Taylor! ♥️

Taylor  Swift is a rock star!  3+ hours of non-stop entertainment.  I don't know how she does it.  The venue was great - we were happy with our 500 level seats purchased directly. We are so happy we didn't have to buy  re-sale tickets. The food of course was a little pricey but everything about the night went smoothly regarding entry, line-ups and finding our way around. We also got a pre-paid parking spot which was so convenient. We loved the way the audience was engaged for the night with what they wore and the bracelet trading. It was a great overall experience.  Taylor put on an amazing show. We are just hoping TS doesn't change her family friendly style - some of her more recent work is getting questionable.  We thoroughly enjoyed Gracie Adams as well - and loved that they sang together.

Literally such an amazing night!! So glad to have witnessed Taylor’s performance. Loved every single minute of it and wishing I could go again😭 I feel so lucky that I had the opportunity to experience The Eras Tour 🫶🏽 LOVE LOVE LOVE

I could never say enough good things about this tour. It was everything my daughter and I could have dreamed of. The fight to get tickets was horrendous, but the venue itself was amazing. The security team was phenomenal, everyone we interacted with was so kind, and the merch stands were set up very well considering how busy they were. It was easy to get to our seats and find the nearest restroom. I loved that because of the demographic, men’s restrooms were converted to women’s as well, I never had to wait in line more than a few minutes. And the concert itself was the absolute best concert I’ve ever been to hands-down, the production is insane.

Taylor Swift puts on a show like no other. The theatrics, the amazing dancing, the visuals and the MUSIC were all absolutely perfect! It was the largest venue I’ve ever been to and somehow it felt super intimate. The lights were fun, the light up bracelets were insanely cool and I will never run out of things to say about Taylor Swift.
She is pure talent and I am so grateful I could go.

The Eras Tour was the most magical ✨, epic concert!  
Taylor Swift was breathtakingly gorgeous, the stage, the set, production and lighting were unbelievable.  Just when I thought it couldn’t get any better, it did and kept going!🩷🩵💜  
N3 in TO had us on our feet for hours dancing, singing and in total awe.  We celebrated Gracie’s Grammy nom. and our surprise acoustic set brought me back to my last TO Reputation Tour with Out of the Woods!💚🐍🖤 
I feel so fortunate to have been given a ticket code over a year ago and will forever remember my Eras Tour experience. Thank you Taylor Swift and everyone who made the show possible, to the Rogers Centre crew for a smooth running event, and to Ticketmaster for access to the tickets.
Forever grateful,
~Northern Concert Fan
Everything about the concert was perfect! Taylor knows how to put on a good show!!

It was a DREAM COME TRUE to see Taylor Swift in person. I had the night of my life singing my heart out to all of her songs. I took one star away only because of the insane food prices and the disorganization of the merch lines. Other than those, I had the best night of my life at the Eras Tour.
The best production you will see. Taylor and her crew take you on a journey through the eras. It is beautiful and fun to watch, sing a long, and enjoy an evening with 60000+ other fans.

The Taylor Swift Toronto Concert was incredible. Taylor, the Dancers, the Band, staging, the video displays, and atmosphere were indescribable out of this world! My first Taylor Swift concert and I will be a Swiftee forever!

The Taylor Swift Toronto Concert was incredible. Taylor, the Dancers, the Band, staging, the video displays, and atmosphere were indescribable out of this world! My first Taylor Swift concert and I will be a Swiftee forever!

Taylor puts on a hell of a show. Just be prepared to pay. Got tickets from tickets master. Expensive but i suppose the #1 selling artist on earth is going to be. Merch was expensive and drinks/snacks at the venue were brutal expensive. 

Shows are becoming out of reach for most people. As a Swifty dad I don't understand how most people can afford prices like this. 

But again she puts out a world class show and people throw money to see it, so good for her.

After waiting 18 months to hear Taylor sing it was everything that we hoped it would be! Taylor sang for three hours straight to a sold out crowd. Everyone was so nice and the Rogers Center was so organized getting everyone into and out of the venue. I had an amazing time and can not say enough good things about the experience!
If you can go, go. I actually cried. What a magical experience. So many emotions in one night and the crowd was incredible.

The concert was absolutely AMAZINGGGGG, I’m still in shock!! Absolutely worth every penny!! Everyone working at the venue was really friendly, and I felt safe the whole time! Merch lines were CRAZY.. but overall the BEST concert I’ve ever been to!!❤️

This was by far the most exciting venue I have ever went to . The stage was amazing, how it was all movable led screens. Taylor was amazing .lm still in awe. Toronto went above and beyond to make you feel safe in there fine city. Go train was great way to get there as there was extra trains and no overcrowding.Rodgers was great in helping me to my seat as I was having mobility issues. Best night ever !

I would have given this show 5/5 because Taylor was awesome. But we had obstructed tickets thanks to 1 of the 4 large light/sound/pyrotechnic towers built around the stage. Every time Taylor went to the middle portion of the stage, which raised and lowered, (which was a lot) my wife and I couldn’t see at all. This especially sucks considering the price of the “VIP” tickets.
The best concert of my life. Phenomenal ins the only word that comes close to describing it.  Getting tickets was an absolute nightmare though…

A fun experience. Great stage effects, dancing and performance. The venue was perfect. 

Felt like a lot of the songs were lip-synced but enjoyed them nonetheless.

What an amazing show. Loved every moment of it. The lights, sound, dance, singing, wow wow wow. Food and drink options wonderful. Bathroom lines not that bad considering the amount of people at N2 of  Taylor Swift. Merch lines were too long, not enough inventory of styles or sizes. Disappointed no water bottles being sold during concert. Then when I managed to get back in line from floor level non left.  Floor seats were okay but so many people wearing hats and taller than me couldn't see too much.

What an amazing show. Loved every moment of it. The lights, sound, dance, singing, wow wow wow. Food and drink options wonderful. Bathroom lines not that bad considering the amount of people at N2 of  Taylor Swift. Merch lines were too long, not enough inventory of styles or sizes. Disappointed no water bottles being sold during concert. Then when I managed to get back in line from floor level non left.  Floor seats were okay but so many people wearing hats and taller than me couldn't see too much.

this was the most magnificent thing i've ever seen. a spectacle of a show. the songs, the choreography, the visuals, the atmosphere, everything. obviously ms taylor swift could never disappoint. i cried for almost 3 hours straight. 10/10

Taylor Swift is a fantastic singer, it was a great show The way she continued to have no intermission and sing all the way through was absolutely amazing. But I do feel that the hype of everyone going absolutely crazy with Merch and lining up for 7hours is crazy to me.  I feel having a  3 1/2 hours concert was way too long of a show. It would’ve been much better if it stopped around 2 1/2 to 3 hours. I would definitely recommend someone going to see the show but not for thousands of dollars.
Truly blessed to be able to experience such an amazing show! I couldn’t have asked for a smoother experience. The swiftie community coming together to have a great time was incredible to watch!

Taylor put on an amazing experience for all. The lights, the music, and the atmosphere was beyond thrilling and electric. This concert will be remembered for all time and we were all thrilled to be part of the Eras Tour!

I was 13th row - which actually ended up being 3rd off the side tip of the diamond. I was so excited. While purchasing the tickets were rough, everything else was perfect. Staff at the venue were super helpful and it seemed very organized. Prices for drinks were absolutely ridiculous. $15 for a fountain drink? Really?

Gracie Abrams was a great opener who got the crowd hyped!

And then the Main Event. Taylor Swift lit up the stage for 3.5 hours and took us through a journey of her entire career. She was perfection. Fun, energetic, and just magical. If you can go - GO!! Not to be missed!! I can't stress that enough. The vibe of the crowd was immaculate. Swifties are awesome. A+++++++++...

I was 13th row - which actually ended up being 3rd off the side tip of the diamond. I was so excited. While purchasing the tickets were rough, everything else was perfect. Staff at the venue were super helpful and it seemed very organized. Prices for drinks were absolutely ridiculous. $15 for a fountain drink? Really?

Gracie Abrams was a great opener who got the crowd hyped!

Not to be missed!! I can't stress that enough. The vibe of the crowd was immaculate. Swifties are awesome. A+++++++++...

Staff at the venue were super helpful and it seemed very organized. Prices for drinks were absolutely ridiculous. $15 for a fountain drink? Really?

Gracie Abrams was a great opener who got the crowd hyped!

And then the Main Event. Taylor Swift lit up the stage for 3.5 hours and took us through a journey of her entire career. She was perfection. Fun, energetic, and just magical. If you can go - GO!! Not to be missed!! I can't stress that enough. The vibe of the crowd was immaculate. Swifties are awesome. A+++++++++...

Phenomenal Taylor Swift performance, stage prop’s unique, no rain worries (Roger’s Centre roof best added detail being in place). Taylor special drinks tasty with a friendship bracelet ❣️Well organized entry into the venue. Sound in the Roger’s Centre was PERFECT., indeed was amazed and surprised at hot hot PYROTECHNICS experience (first time ever had this at a Taylor concert) in an enclosed stadium. Well worth the drive from NY to beautiful Toronto Canada ❤️ 🇨🇦 ❣️😎

Phenomenal Taylor Swift performance, stage prop’s unique, no rain worries (Roger’s Centre roof best added detail being in place). Taylor special drinks tasty with a friendship bracelet ❣️Well organized entry into the venue. Sound in the Roger’s Centre was PERFECT., indeed was amazed and surprised at hot hot PYROTECHNICS experience (first time ever had this at a Taylor concert) in an enclosed stadium. Well worth the drive from NY to beautiful Toronto Canada ❤️ 🇨🇦 ❣️😎

Words is not enough to express the happiness I’ve experience seeing Taylor Swift in the Stage. I was grateful that ticket master gave me the opportunity to purchase the ticket and I was able to attend Night 3 toronto  Last November 16,2024 with my best friend Krissta. It was the best day of our life attending the Era’s Tour. I’ve waited this half of my life it was a dream come true. Healing my inner child. Hope to see more of Taylor in the near future. For now I will keep that memories and experience in my heart.

Truly devastated it’s over and, absolutely Blown away by the incredible talent and athleticism of every performer. Truly a magical experience getting to see Taylor live and I am forever grateful I was lucky enough to get tickets. 

I’ll be counting down the days until her next tour and hoping every fan gets the opportunity to experience this level of WOW first hand.
It was gorgeous to watch and listen to, the crowd was so alive I could hear everyone and never experienced anything better!

We arrived early got in early we went and bought our merchandise . Everything went very smoothly . The concert set up was very good ,  excellent sound and video . We thoroughly enjoyed the concert . The organizers at the Rogers Centre were great it was a well run show. We had the best time.
The best organization, thank you tkmaster. A girl from Venezuela was able to see her fav artist😍

Magical doesn’t even begin to describe this show. I have seen the movie many times, watched 88 grainy live streams and nothing could have prepared me to see it in person. The atmosphere was electric and pure joy the whole weekend from when we arrived Friday to leaving Sunday after our show on Saturday. Thank you Taylor. You are an absolute gift to the world.

Taylor truly puts on the best concert and she really thinks of all the details. You could see her on stage no matter how far you were because her costumes sparkled. The screens were amazing. The stage was insane. Her band was awesome and interacted with the audience who had restricted views. Literally the best concert ever. Such a vibe.

Best concert ever! Amazing performance !!
3.5 hrs straight
Taylor Swift! What else do you need to know? She performed for well over 2 hours. Went seamlessly from era to era. Sang her heart out, connected with the crowd and exuded positive vibes for everyone.
Taylor Swift! What else do you need to know? She performed for well over 2 hours. Went seamlessly from era to era. Sang her heart out, connected with the crowd and exuded positive vibes for everyone.
Best time ever.   Took my daughter/daughter in laws and granddaughters. Three generations.   A lifetime memory.  We all couldn’t wipe the smiles off our faces.
Great show. Well organized .  Toronto was a great host city .

The show itself was beyond amazing. Taylor put on an energetic performance with beautiful visuals for 3.5 hours, an absolute 5/5! My ticket however, did not say limited or obstructed view and there was a definite obstruction. The large speaker was directly in the sightline of her diamond stage where she spends most of her time. I was quite disappointed that I was not aware prior to purchasing that this would be the case. Although I could watch much of the show on the screen, I could not see Taylor on the diamond stage. Fan services said there was nothing they could do. I would not have been as sad, if I had at least been prepared for the poor view which definitely impacted the full enjoyment of the show. I would otherwise have given this experience a higher rating.

Concert was incredible.  She put on an amazing show.  The costumes were beautiful.  The whole experience of having the tickets and getting emails ahead of the show was very helpful.
I like that the food and drinks were Taylor inspired.  Atmosphere was incredible.

An incredible evening. The atmosphere was unbeatable!

One suggestion for improvement is the concession prices are a bit high.
This was such an unforgettable experience! Show was awesome and the fans were even better! The whole atmosphere was full of love and respect!! Thanks Taylor!
The Eras Tour was the best concert I’ve ever been to! The production quality was insane and I enjoyed every second of the 3 hour concert! Taylor was amazing to watch in person!

I highly recommend anyone who can see TS live! As my husband will attest, the movie and live streams do not do the show, her energy or the production justice. Be careful with seats though. We had a straight on view 200 level but the 13th row had a huge overhang at Rogers Centre. It cut off part of the view and was distracting until about halfway through when we got so absorbed by her talent. Also felt terrible because I had to ask the young (20 something) not to scream sing. She was literally just screaming every word. But she was so full of energy and love for TS I felt bad but having overpaid for seats it was disruptive. I saw TS in Stockholm N1 and N2 and the loud singing is usually a positive and everyone together drowns out a single voice (but wasn’t case in Toronto N2).  My husband did not want to go having heard the terrible singing in the livestreams but it was not an issue when we weren’t against a wall and were instead immersed in the crowd. All this is a long way to say it is worth it but consider seats carefully and research the venue if you can!!!
Incredible Show, Taylor rocked for over 3 hrs and ended with a bang! Play’s guitar, piano, & keeps bringing it!

Exceeded expectations in every way.  Lived up to the hype. Rogers Centre did a fantastic job, as did Toronto in keeping the concert organized and safe.  Taylor is a class act.  Her talent knows no boundaries.  The people she surrounds herself with are also among the best in the business.  It was 3.5 hours of awesomeness.  Fans extended that awesomeness to hours before and after the show.  Well done!  Not sure we will ever be able to top this concert!!
I don’t think words can describe what it was like attending this concert!  It was absolutely magical!  The atmosphere, the performance, the love in that stadium are something we will never forget!

It was the best concert EVER! I felt so lucky I was able to win the draw and get the tickets for my friend and I. 
Definitely worth the trip traveling from Vancouver to Toronto. 
The whole city was literally filled with Swiftiea from the moment we stepped onto the UP express. Great atmosphere and everyone was all so lovely and friendly! 
Big shout out to the city of Toronto to also have it incredibly organized and the public transit under control ❤️
Would I go to another Taylor concert? ABSOLUTELY!

This concert was absolutely phenomenal. Her vocals, the choreography, light up bracelets, the sets. Truly was just all around amazing. No matter what seat you were in you had a good view and just the overall atmosphere was amazing. Everyone so kind and wanting to trade bracelets and just interact and compliments from everyone!

The Taylor Swift Eras Tour, was an amazing experience!!!! Such a high energy, and extremely entertaining performances by all involved!!! Taylor was phenomenal 💞💞
The entry into the Roger's Center in Toronto was very well organized and took very little time!! It was also evident that the city had definitely prepared for this event!!!
The excitement around the venue, and the city in general was wonderful!!
I am so happy and feel very fortunate to have been able to experience this event of a lifetime!!!!

It was absolutely magical, incredible, amazing and a night I’ll never ever forget.  It was a long time coming. My review of Ticketmaster is not reflected in this. It would be a negative million stars for Ticketmaster and how they’ve dealt with all this ticket fiasco.
I went to Toronto N2 and it was so magical. Concert took almost 4 hours and it worth it!!

This was the fifth time seeing Taylor Swift; second time seeing the Eras Tour (we saw it pre and post TTPD). It’s the best concert ever!! I would go again, several times, if I had the time (and mostly) the money. It’s unfortunate that tickets are so hard to acquire and so costly because I wish everyone could see her perform. The atmosphere at her concerts are so kind and fun, we enjoyed trading bracelets it bother fans prior to the show. Just an overall excellent performance and all around experience.

It’s the very best.  She puts on such an amazing beautiful and thoughtful performance.
Her fan base and all the lore she has created is something wonderful my daughter and I have been a part of for years.
She’s positive and kind and joyful and that spirit is what will you will find in the 40 -70 thousand people you are there with.

I was a fan of Taylor Swift but this concert made me a MEGA FAN.  She is such an accomplished high achiever who performs with passion and makes it so FUN for the audience.  And cmon 3.5 hours of singing and dancing - CRAZY athletic accomplishment too.  Rogers Center has the best staff - they were so friendly and kind and excited.  Entry and process of entry was so well managed and quick! We felt safe and could focus on the concert!

It was a once in a lifetime experience. She is the real deal. Over 3 hours of perfection. Taylor Swift’s energy is truly unmatched and the performance quality was exceptional. Opening act was amazing. Not to be missed if you can score tickets.

What an Enchanted, awe-inspiring evening with Taylor! The beautiful, positive vibe at Rogers Centre left me in a Lavender Haze. This is a show I will remember All Too Well for my whole life. I can't Shake It Off; this is a Love Story between Taylor and her fans. Never in my Wildest Dreams did I think a concert could have such a profound effect on me. Don't Blame Me if I'm talking about it for years to come. Taylor really is Bigger Than The Whole Sky. Long Story Short, I'm The Lucky One for experiencing The Best Day as a Swiftie.
Such an amazing experience, Taylor put on the best show I’ve ever seen and can’t believe she sang for 3.5hrs! Would go see the ERAS Tour again hands down!
Taylor Swift is the ultimate performer. Her show was flawlessly executed and the audience was electric.

The era's tour was the such a fantastic concert. The experience was everything I wanted it to be and more. Theatrics, talent, dance sequences, plus Taylor absolutely slayed the performances. I literally didn't sit down or stop dancing along for 3.5 hours. AMAZING!!!
I am not a Swiftie but this show was the best show I saw in my life! TS what an amazing performer!!! 3.5 hours of singing, dancing, running wow wow 👌 👏

Being a lucky one that got a code and was able to get these tickets at face value was amazing otherwise I wouldn't have been able to afford a ticket. Taylor was Beautiful, perfect, insane, all the words. The concert felt so SAFE. Swifties know how to create an inspiring passionate and exciting experience. We traded bracelets sang our hearts out. I cried alot. The rogers centre was incredibly helpful and easy to navigate. The lines weren't bad at all and there's always something to do while waiting. The city was welcoming to us Swifties and we had a marvelous time. The concert is incredibly long and I don't know how Taylor does this back to back to back. It was the best night of my life and I feel incredibly grateful to have gotten the chance to go. The transit back to the hotel was easy and quick. The whole experience was 13/10 and if I ever have the chance to go again I would absolutely take it. Thank you Taylor 🩷.

As a 52-year old woman who went with a bunch of girlfriends, this show was absolutely amazing, from start to finish.  I can’t say enough about the 3.5 hour performance besides I can’t wait for the next tour, whether jts in another 2 or 10 years ever.  Thank you, Taylor, for the best girls trip, and thank you Toronto!

This was my 17th TS Show, my 3rd Eras Tour. I would go every night if I could. I don’t know how she has the energy to perform for over three hours, dance and drop to the floor on her knees and hop up. She is a true athlete and performer with the best concert production on any tour.
The only bad thing about her concert was that it had to end. She’s an amazing, engaging performer and storyteller. The entire stadium was enamored through all 3 hours.
The only bad thing about her concert was that it had to end. She’s an amazing, engaging performer and storyteller. The entire stadium was enamored through all 3 hours.

This show is electric. If you have the opportunity and are lucky enough to get a ticket ~ you will experience a world class performer give it her all for 3 hours!!!! It is a nonstop whirlwind of decades flashing in Taylor’s Eras. The lights, the sets, outfit changes, dancers- everything perfect.

I was in 238 so I had a perfect view of the diamond. Taylor was easily the best performer I’ve ever seen. It was a 3.5 hour show and by the end of it my feet hurt so bad, so props to her for doing the whole thing in heels because I was limping out of there in flats lol. Best night of my life, would definitely see her again.

The Eras Tour was the most incredible show I’ve ever witnessed!! We sat in the “nosebleeds” and let me tell you we had some of the very best seats in the house! You could see everything and feel the heat from the flames she sets off!! The layout for the concert was just perfect - everyone had the best seats! Taylor is an absolute LEGEND! To sing and dance for 3.5 hours was absolutely insane!! And I had no idea time could go by so fast!! Also, Gracie Abrams was totally too notch!! Such a great opening act!! I wish everyone had the chance to be part of this experience! Core memory set in place for myself and my 2 daughters! We’ve loved Taylor since day 1 and saw the Reputation tour when it came to Toronto-which was also incredible but all of her albums, in one place- life changing!!
Absolute life changing show. Even after 3 hours of playing I still wasn't ready for it to be over.

I truly feel like we won the lottery by getting these tickets. It was by far the best concert I’ve ever seen! I am 54 years old and went with my daughters and grand daughter. So I’ve seen many concerts over the years and I am not a Swiftie by any means. If you can get tickets I highly recommend! Also playing for 3.5 hours is such a rare treat these days.
I truly had the best time of my entire life seeing Taylor in concert! The show doesn’t feel like it’s 3.5 hours long because you’re just having so much fun!
Taylor swift is the GOAT she sang for over three hours.!!!!

An amazing experience! Eras lived up to the hype! Taylor was fantastic, on stage for +3 hours and was incredibly engaging. The Swifties were out in force, such a great community; the SuperDome was filled with love and support.

i attended the eras tour at hard rock stadium and could not have possibly had a better time! after being a fan for years, getting to finally see her in concert was such a delight and privilege. the 3 and a half hour long show is just full of nonstop joy and happiness and it was truthfully the best day of my life. there is never even close to a boring moment and that is why it is the highest grossing tour of all time! she will never put on a show like this ever again, so with it all coming to an end soon, i HIGHLYYY recommend going if you are able to!
Taylor Swift was such an amazing experience! She put on a beautiful show and performed for more than three hours! We loved second!!

This concert was EVERYTHING! I loved EVERY SINGLE SECOND! There was no dull moment. She kept me on my feet all 3 1/2 hours. My ONLY complaint is that it had to end. I would’ve stayed forever if she kept performing.

As a mom my heart will cherish this night for the rest of my life.   It was pure love.   The excitement and joy resonating from every person in that arena added to the insane brilliance of the show itself.  I wish there were words in the English language to do the evening justice.   So I will settle on being grateful for that 3.5 hours with my daughter.   It will stay with us forever.
Taylor puts on an amazing show.  3 and 1/2 hours of music. Definitely worth every penny. Plus Taylor has the nicest fans!
This was the best concert I have ever attended.  The atmosphere was electric and she did an amazing job.  One song after another without hardly a break.  So glad I was able to experience it!

Taylor was amazing! We kept talking about how she puts on a 3-1/2hr show and doesn’t take a break! Then she goes to do it three nights in a row! I work an 8 hour day sitting at a desk and I’m exhausted! She was built for this! The show was flawless!
worth every single penny to see my favorite artist live. the show she puts on is absolutely insane and the fastest 3.5 hours of life. i would go again and again and again.
The concert was amazing! She is an incredible performer and continuously for over 3 hours! Our seats were high up but we were able to enjoy every minute!

I went with my daughter to the Eras tour in Indy.  It was her first ever concert and my first since Covid.  The show was amazing and Taylor was electric.  I feel that my daughter will be ruined for future concerts if she is expecting the headliner to be on stage for 3.5 hours.   Everything about the concert itself was great (crowd, lights, sound, performers, etc). 

My complaints have to do with merchandise and food.  The lines were long and wait was horrendous.  We waited an hour in one of the merch lines.  I ordered and paid for a pizza and then had to wait 10 minutes for it to be ready.  Those two things combined caused me to miss the opening act.  

All things considered I did enjoy myself and would recommend for everyone to see this show regardless of fandom.
